body: {"createInSfmc":true,"dryRun":false,"forceTokenRefresh":true,"journeySpec":{"key":"11111111-2222-4333-8444-555555555555","name":"test1_NBN_ACTIVATION_WELCOME_JOURNEY","description":"Draft journey for NBN activation welcome flow","workflowApiVersion":"1.0","triggers":[{"type":"Event","key":"TRIGGER_1","name":"NBN Activation Entry","configurationArguments":{"eventDefinitionKey":"NBN_Activation_Entry_JSDE"},"outcomes":[{"next":"WAIT_5_MIN"}]}],"activities":[{"key":"WAIT_5_MIN","type":"WAIT","name":"Wait 5 minutes","configurationArguments":{"waitDuration":5,"waitUnit":"MINUTES"},"outcomes":[{"next":"EMAIL_SEND"}]},{"key":"EMAIL_SEND","type":"EMAIL","name":"Send Email","configurationArguments":{"emailAssetId":796117},"outcomes":[{"next":"WAIT_1_DAY"}]},{"key":"WAIT_1_DAY","type":"WAIT","name":"Wait 1 day","configurationArguments":{"waitDuration":1,"waitUnit":"DAYS"},"outcomes":[{"next":"ENGAGEMENT_SPLIT"}]},{"key":"ENGAGEMENT_SPLIT","type":"ENGAGEMENTSPLIT","name":"Open Engagement Split","configurationArguments":{"criteria":"OpenedEmail","waitDuration":1,"waitUnit":"DAYS","emailActivityKey":"EMAIL_SEND"},"outcomes":[{"next":"UPDATE_CONTACT_OPEN"},{"next":"UPDATE_CONTACT_OPEN"}]},{"key":"UPDATE_CONTACT_OPEN","type":"UPDATECONTACT","name":"Update InsertedDate","configurationArguments":{"dataExtensionName":"NBN_Activation_Entry_JSDE","updateFields":[{"fieldName":"InsertedDate","value":"getdate"}]},"outcomes":[]}]}}
